messages.content: Latest financial performance, quarterly results, and market sentiment for Apple. Include recent news and analyst opinions.

Apple's latest financial performance is impressive, with the company reporting record-setting Q1 2026 results. Here are the key highlights:

**Financial Performance:**

* Revenue: $143.8 billion, a significant increase from the previous quarter.
* Net quarterly profit: $42.1 billion, or $2.84 per diluted share.
* iPhone sales: Apple delivered its best iPhone quarterly sales performance in over four years, with a significant contribution to the company's revenue growth. [Source: https://www.macrumors.com/2026/01/29/apple-1q-2026-earnings/](https://www.macrumors.com/2026/01/29/apple-1q-2026-earnings/), https://www.investing.com/news/earnings/apple-reports-best-iphone-quarterly-sales-performance-in-over-four-years-4474527)

**Quarterly Results:**

* Apple's fiscal Q1 2026 results exceeded holiday-quarter goals, driven by record iPhone sales and surging services.
* The company's growth story is gaining momentum, with a projected 13% to 16% year-over-year sales increase in the current quarter (fiscal Q2 2026). [Source: https://www.investors.com/news/technology/apple-stock-aapl-fiscal-q1-2026-earnings/](https://www.investors.com/news/technology/apple-stock-aapl-fiscal-q1-2026-earnings/), https://public.com/stocks/aapl/forecast-price-target](https://public.com/stocks/aapl/forecast-price-target))

**Market Sentiment:**

* Apple's stock jumped after the record Q1 revenue announcement, indicating a positive market sentiment.
* Analysts are optimistic about Apple's growth prospects, with a focus on the company's AI initiatives and improving gross margins. [Source: https://finance.yahoo.com/news/stock-market-today-feb-2-225055170.html](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/stock-market-today-feb-2-225055170.html)

**Analyst Opinions:**

* Analysts expect Apple's growth to continue, with a projected 13% to 16% year-over-year sales increase in the current quarter.
* The company's AI moves and improving gross margins are seen as key drivers of growth. [Source: https://public.com/stocks/aapl/forecast-price-target](https://public.com/stocks/aapl/forecast-price-target))

Overall, Apple's latest financial performance and quarterly results have been impressive, with a positive market sentiment and optimistic analyst opinions. The company's focus on AI and improving gross margins is expected to drive growth in the coming quarters.
